items.title: The Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy With $2,000 Right Now
items.author: Chris Neiger
items.description: The article discusses two stocks from Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway portfolio that could be good investments amid market volatility: Amazon and American Express.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article highlights Amazon's strong e-commerce business and growing cloud computing segment, which are expected to perform well even in a downturn.

The article notes that American Express has reported strong financial results, added new cardholders, and its stock is trading at a discount compared to a few months ago, making it an attractive investment option.
